main.name: Satish Kumar

main.bio: My name is Satish Kumar L, I'm a web Design Developer. Currently I'm working at Flyleaf Technologies. I live in bangalore. 1 Year of experience in WordPress for a startup company named Flyleaf Technologies as web Design and Developer. Proficient in website Design and Development projects with wordpress. Good at Designing the Logo, Brochures, Templates with Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Also interested in React Js looking forward to become a React js Developer.

address.street: No 48 & 49, SM Residency, 1st floor, 2nd Main road, Old manjunatha layout, Dooravaninagar (post), Ramurthynagar,

work.title: Web Design and Developer
work.description: 1 Year of experience in WordPress for a startup company named Flyleaf Technologies as web Design and Developer. Working on the website Design and Development projects with wordpress. Designing the Logo, Brochures, Templates with Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator for company promotion. Working on Google ads like creating campaign and researching keywords. Strong understanding in website Design and Development, hosting the website, maintaining the website, SSL activation and complete Cpanel maintenance.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Naz must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
